config.description: Conector de entrada de dados referente ao rebate cancelado
config.timestamp.column.name: dt_movimento
config.query:
SELECT  *
FROM
(
	SELECT  DISTINCT 
			be.Id_Boleto                          AS id_boleto
	       ,CAST(be.ValorRebate AS NUMERIC(15,2)) AS valor
	       ,be.DataEmissao                        AS dt_movimento
	FROM arquivocargastd arq
	INNER JOIN CargasCredito cb
	ON cb.ID_ARQUIVOCARGASTD = arq.ID_ARQUIVOCARGASTD
	INNER JOIN CargaControleFinanceiro cf
	ON cf.Id_CargaControleFinanceiro = cb.Id_CargaControleFinanceiro
	INNER JOIN BoletosEmitidos be
	ON be.Id_Boleto = cf.Id_Boleto
	WHERE cb.status <> 6
	AND ARQ.STATUS IN (3, 4, 5, 6)
	AND BE.ValorRebate > 0
	AND CB.DataCancelamento IS NOT NULL
) AS RebateCancelado
config.transforms.setSchemaName.schema.name: br.com.mac-edu.schema.ConnConfirmacaoRebateCanceladoValue
